props.title: Scheduled checkpoints
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.checkpointsScheduledPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Requested checkpoints
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.checkpointsRequestedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Buffers written for checkpoint
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.buffersWrittenForCheckpointsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Buffers written by background writer
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.buffersWrittenByBackgroundWriterPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Background writer stops
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.backgroundWriterStopsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Buffers written per backend
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.buffersWrittenByBackendPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Buffers allocated
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.buffersAllocatedPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Backend fsync Calls
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.backendFsyncCallsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Checkpoint write Time
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.checkpointWriteTimeInMillisecondsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto

props.title: Checkpoint sync Time
props.query: SELECT average(`postgres.instance.bgwriter.checkpointSyncTimeInMillisecondsPerSecond`) FROM Metric WHERE `entityGuid` = '{{entity.id}}' TIMESERIES auto
